We at FAREPAK VICTIMS COMMITTEE are calling on the Government to bring in regulations to protect the consumers from the unregulated system of VOUCHERS!!
HMV
JESSOPS
ETHEL AUSTIN FOR THE 5TH TIME!
COMET
BLACKS LEISURE
LASENZA
FIRETRAP
GAME GROUP
PEACOCKS
PAST TIMES
To name but a few. Each of them sold vouchers right up to announcing Administration which in reality means they knowingly sold a voucher that would become worthless to the consumer.
Its time it stopped and STOPPED NOW!!
